review: the best game on steam 10010 it changed my life for the better gave me food for thought and a lot of emotions and i am also a certified alisophage thanks to the soviets for this amazing game and in particular to all the modders for their work in the workshop
good novel i have played it on both pc and phone
its down the road not across the street
its very well written and the story ends up running a lot deeper than youd expect  theres no way the author doesnt have some grounding in the esoteric its crazy considering its an anime harem game
h1 absolute gooner game h1

a surprisingly touching visual novel while it has some mature themes the story explores personal growth regret and finding connection in unexpected places the various routes offer diverse experiences making for a replayable and thoughtprovoking journey

honestly kinda a classic i really love the vibes it has from the start with the winter and cold and then the summer camp vibes i would recommend it i think its a great visual novel although the bad endings are kinda bullshit which seems to be a trend in a lot of vns

actually not a bad game that makes you feel a different range of emotions somewhere laughter somewhere worry somewhere anger the game also gives quite interesting characters with all their positive and negative sides with different characters and set of qualities the game teaches a simple lesson dont be irresponsible infantile perpetually depressive whining loser like the main character but be able to recognize the flaws in yourself and work on them
lena is the best girl you cant convince me otherwise

very good story charming characters really good immersion but the best part is the vibe the entire game just has such a certain vibe to it that makes it stand out its hard to get across exactly what that vibe is theres such an underlying feeling of nostalgia when playing for some reason perhaps it is due to the setting or the themes of youth and personal regrowth anyways i love this game definitely recommend it to any vn fans
cool game
well finally i decided to go through the classic visual novels i havent completed all the endings yet but ive already experienced ecstasy
good

its absolutely worth playing through  i didnt really identify with the main character but i still enjoyed it i also appreciate that the h images are optional via official mod rather than forcing you to experiencing them
reading is dope as fuck

its really a good game and its obvious that the production team put a lot of effort into it im a geek much like the main character in just seven days at summer camp i met the girls and the best things happened work on myself to create a happy family and be a good person

it was amazing im definitely gonna play again but this time i just focused on getting comfy guy ending and omg i got such a scare at the end but when it all played out i was so happy its soosososoos amazing
yes

i played everlasting summer more than once everlasting summer turned out to be a real classic for me in the novel genre due to its interesting plot and atmospheric music the illustrations were difficult to do but they added originality i completed it more than once and completed it 100
very satisfied with the depth of story lines even what you might call the bad ending was brilliant

life changing game  extremely well designed  arguably the best game i ever played meaningful choices  gives the player enough space to enjoy and get through the game easily while having a few laughs
absolutely love it despite only ever getting bad endings

best visual nivel i have ever read

im writing this after going through all the routines the game isnt bad but i cant say its what i imagined it to be because of the public opinion distorted perception and i thought this game is a masterpiece of the cis but it turned out to be much simpler and downtoearth this game is good and it deserves attention despite the large number of ridiculous and strange moments  i recommend playing it  y
its a nice short story not too long some ending are really easier to get than others i was kinda expecting more

overall a good visual novel   you can genuinely feel that the game is more than 10 years old already however the characters are good some events really leave you in shock there are some solid plottwists and easter eggs however i felt plotholes in some places mistakes in artwork   if you just like me somehow never played it before 2025 or still dont know the story of the game and have some free time to waste try it out

a game for gooners but me not gooned enough from that

the game is for those who are ready to go through all the endings and get depressed   the harsh reality of a childrens pioneer camp and nonchildish entertainment   if it werent for mods there would be no point in this game but the modifications allow us to call this game a game for any depressed period 20 years in advance
so cool and nice to play as seymen sigmadog
the game is so good  after playing for hours i suddenly can speak russian now       d 3

outstanding story i do wish the artwork was a bit more consistent looks like different artists with totally different styles worked on different parts but still worth every minute i spent playing it and i highly recommend it to others

ive been playing this game for the third time since 2019 although i knew about this game before when i started i wasnt even 18 years old so this project left a very big mark on my soul it lit a flame of hope in many yes i know that the story of semyon persunov is just a fiction of the scriptwriters and shouldnt be relied on but can this mean that i dont have the right to arrange a movie for myself at least once in my life

i recommend this game
